code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{removeFromCart,clearCart}from"../Redux/cartSlice";import{FaTrashAlt}from"react-icons/fa";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import'./Cart.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const navigate=useNavigate();const cartItems=useSelector(state=>state.cart);console.log('Cart Items:',cartItems);const handleRemoveItem=id=>{dispatch(removeFromCart(id));};const handleClearCart=()=>{dispatch(clearCart());};const handleProceedToCheckout=()=>{if(cartItems.length===0){alert("Your cart is empty.
